content: Yes, I agree. Someone needs to research the first Air Assault School in Germany. The first school was @ Sickles Army Airfield in Fulda. It was operated by the 4th Squadron of the 11th ACR (Blackhorse). I am a graduate of the school and also a former TAC (Trainer, Advisor, Councelor) for Bravo Company of the Blackhorse Air Assault School. The school was recognized by TRADOC. Scouts Out and Rangers Lead the Way. Mike Winsauer

content: quote: Originally posted by iamgonzo: You two have to be wrong, the press never makes mistakes. This 'press' is an official organ of the United States Army - the ' Soldiers Magazine'. It demonstrates the principle that no research is needed for creative writing. Hence the valuable part of military communications and PR training.
